I dont know anything about Junit .

My project people are using Junit for unit testing and Load testing.

anyone guide me how to use it..

thanks
alagu

John Stetic wrote:

> I'm evaluating using Junit++ for some of our testing tasks, and I have run
> into a problem.
>
> I have a ConfigurableTestCase that works fine when I run it by it's self,
> but when I call some of the test methods from an external test suite I get
> an IllegalArgumentException.   What could I be doing wrong?  Is there
> anything special that I need to do to use a ConfigurableTestCase with an
> external test suite?
>
> Thanks for the help,
>
> John Stetic
